name: Birth Year
description: The year the historical figure was born.

name: Death Year
description: The year the historical figure passed away.

name: Field of Influence
description: The primary area in which the historical figure made their mark (e.g., politics, science, arts).

name: Major Achievements
description: Key accomplishments that define the historical figure's legacy.

name: Personality Traits
description: Notable personality characteristics of the historical figure.

name: Cultural Impact
description: The extent to which the historical figure influenced culture and society.

name: Controversial Aspects
description: Any controversial actions or beliefs associated with the historical figure.

name: Historical Context
description: The socio-political environment during the historical figure's lifetime.
